name: Heart Neverdie
description:
HEART NEVERDIE        

          In the 256th century, Human’s technology is too high performance for change themselves into cyborg. But in that period, Human can’t live because of disasters effects. So human built civilization in space with the leader, Mr.Nui . But human want to occupy the “Heart Neverdie”, the thing that can give a immortal live. One day, Human discovered a Robot Planet that has the “Heart Neverdie”. Mr.Nui ordered his army to invade Robot Planet. At that time, “Leo” a leader of Robot Planet, evacuated everyone to another place. So human occupied Robot Planet and the Heart Never Die successful. After Leo escape from human with a grudge against humans. It made him upgrade himself for take back Robot Planet and the Heart Neverdie.

HOW  TO  PLAY :

  • W A S D - Moving
  • Shift - Running (only in normal mode)
  • Left Mouse Click - Shoot
  • Right Mouse Click - Aim mode
  • Spacebar - Dash (only in aim mode)

TEAM  MEMBER :

  • Bhumintra Chantanasevi 630117010014 ( Programmer, Project Manager )

  • Teenathorn Boonduang 630117010037 ( UI Designer )
  • Setteepetch Amsamang 630117010051 ( Story, Assets Finder )
  • Wanlapa Pinsorn 630117010063 ( 2D Artist )
  • Phaibun Ausantiwong 630117010005 ( Cutscene Maker, Tester)
  • Benjawan Prasit 630117010043 ( Level Designer )
